price: A podvojili su se oni kojima je data Knjiga baš onda kad im je došao dokaz jasni,
arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā tafarraqa alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba illā min baʿdi mā jāathumu al-bayinatu
